name: ATV Madness Lite
description:
This is the lite version of our game 'ATV Madness'.
Ride your ATV with this amazing ATV racing simulator. Make tricks to earn extra-credits to unlock vehicles ! Feel the realism of the full 3d outdoor environment with 12 ATV models coming with different power,grip and brake settings. Enter the game right from the beginning with the stunning 3d menu replicating the real scene of a race backstage!
